data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valdesalici, Stefano, Voort, Stefan Van Der (2015): Four new species of the Indo-Burmese genus Badis from West Bengal, India (Actinopterygii: Perciformes: Badidae). Zootaxa 3985 (3): 391-408, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3985.3.4
